descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w422/Den987/ScreenShot781.png[/IMG]
============
[color=blue]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Sonya - Mage Frost
She can conjure Frost Atronach and fight by Frostbite
Marryable , Essential , Frost Magic , Auto-level
Age 20 , Young Voice
[color=blue]You can find her in Windpeak Inn (Dawnstar)[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=blue]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Better Female by Bella
CBBE

=============
[color=blue]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Female 1.0


=============
[color=blue]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder
=============
[color=blue]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=blue]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod[/center]
author: Den987
